list-item.p: The population is uniform and mixes homogeneously,
The latent period is not crucial for the susceptible-infective interaction, so the compartment of exposed is omitted,
The recruited newborns who received first dose of vaccine join the Vaccinated class, but recruited newborns who have not received first dose of vaccine join the susceptible class.
An infected individual makes contact and is able to transmit the disease,
There is no treatment failure if you receive first and second doses of vaccine, a patient will either recover or die.
